description: This requirement is for Prairies Economic Development Canada (PrairiesCan) ... CCTI and the CCTI-IF to assess the performance of the short-term and mid-term outcomes of the support in Alberta, and Saskatchewan.
full_summary:
### TSPS (Solutions)  Tender Notice: Business Consulting/Change Management Services

#### Reference Number: cb-7424-99494383

#### Tender Status: Expired (Appel Offres Expiré)

#### Tender Description: 
Prairies Economic Development Canada (PrairiesCan) invites bids from eligible contractors to provide Business Consulting/Change Management Services for the Canada Coal Transition Initiative (CCTI) and the Canada Coal Transition Initiative - Infrastructure Fund (CCTI-IF).

The services will be provided to support the economic diversification and transition of affected communities in Alberta and Saskatchewan, from a coal-fired electricity generation economy to a low-carbon economy. The initiatives aim to invest in capacity-building, entrepreneurship, business start-up and expansion, supply chain development, and infrastructure.

The successful contractor will be required to provide a comprehensive impact evaluation of the CCTI and the CCTI-IF initiatives, assessing their performance in achieving short-term and mid-term outcomes. The evaluation will also assess the likelihood of long-term outcomes after funding ends.

#### Tender Details:
* Tender Reference Number: cb-7424-99494383
* Tender Closing Date and Time: Monday, 2023-08-28, 17:00:00 MST
* Expected Contract Start Date: Tuesday, 2023-09-04
* Expected Contract End Date: Monday, 2024-03-31
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Saskatchewan, Alberta
* Procurement Category: SRV (Services - Advisory)
* Notice Type: RFP against Supply Arrangement
* Tender Status: Expired

#### Contact Information:
* Contact Name: Ryan Bent
* Email: ryan.bent@prairiescan.gc.ca
* Phone: (403) 921-7545
* Address: Suite 419, Harry Hays Building, 220 – 4th Avenue S.E., Calgary, Alberta T2G 4X3

#### Access to Tender Documents:
The tender documents can be accessed on the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell website: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/). Relevent bid documents are available in English and French.
